mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( ENROLL_DT, MEMO, BREAKFAST, LUNCH, DINNER, SNACK, MIDNIGHT_SNACK, MEMBER_ID ) VALUES ( #{enrollDt}, #{memo}, #{breakfast}, #{lunch}, #{dinner}, #{snack}, #{midnightSnack}, #{memberId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET MEMO = #{memo}, BREAKFAST = #{breakfast}, LUNCH = #{lunch}, DINNER = #{dinner}, SNACK = #{snack}, MIDNIGHT_SNACK = #{midnightSnack} WHERE ENROLL_DT = #{enrollDt} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SCHEDULE WHERE ENROLL_DT = #{enrollDt} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
